column5: I have an older polaris cover that will fit a late eighties up to mid 90s polaris snow machine. It was used on an older trail but would fit any of the older 500s as well. It is well used condition but it is better than no cover and the price is right...free.
that would be the perfect theft deterent for my Yamaha
i've got a chum that will pay to ship it up north should you not find someone down there to take it.

Awesome offer, if you were closer to Toronto, I would take you up on your offer, just got my first sled this year, a 1997 Polaris Indy 500. I was so excited, but with the lack of snow, I'm getting stir crazy here lol.
